entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
